resources.string: New User? Click here to Register
Time limit for each question: 15 seconds
Click to go back to the Menu
You haven\'t played any quiz now.
What is the time limit for each question?
Time limit for each question is 15 seconds. If you fail to answer in 15 seconds next question will be displayed automatically.
Where can I see all of my scores?
In the profile section, there is a button \'Results\', you can click on the button to view your score in all quizzes.
There are 10 questions in every quiz.
How can I set my profile picture?
Click on the profile icon given in top right corner of dashboard page. Profile page will open. Click on the image icon and choose your picture which you want to upload.
What is the format of quiz?

There are total of 10 questions in each quiz having 4 options. Any one of those 4 options can be the answer. You have to select the option which is correct to give your answer. There is no negative marking and 1 mark is given for each correct answer.

Brain+ is a quiz app where you can play quizzes, have fun and learn something new! Brain+ covers subjects like 
Cricket Quiz,
GK Quiz,
Computer Quiz
and many more. 
Education doesn't stop in the classroom, use our app to learn on the go.
